```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(here)
  library(readr)
  library(ggplot2)
  library(dplyr)
  library(tidyr)
})
```


```{r}
my_files <- list.files(here("output_time"))

time_table <- NULL
for (i in (1:length(my_files))){
  tmp_table <- read_csv(here("output_time", my_files[i]))
  time_table <- rbind(time_table, tmp_table)
}
time_table
```

```{r}
time_table <- tidyr::pivot_longer(time_table, c(null, pca), names_to = "phases", values_to = "time")
time_table
```


```{r}
time_table %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = n_obs, y = time, color = phases, linetype = data_type)) + 
  geom_line() + scale_y_log10()
```



Make sure you have latest version (needs glmpca >= 0.2.0)
```{r, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("willtownes/glmpca")
remotes::install_github("kstreet13/scry@hdf5") # install HDF5 branch
```


```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(SingleCellExperiment)
  library(DelayedArray)
  library(BiocSingular)
  library(scry)
  library(here)
  library(ggplot2)
})
```



```{r}
dat <- data.frame("ns" = ns[-8], 
                  # "inmem" = time_realized[,3]/60, 
                  "ondisk" = time_da[-8,3]/60)
dat <- tidyr::pivot_longer(dat, -ns, names_to = "type", values_to = "time")
readr::write_csv(dat, here::here())

ggplot(dat, aes(x=ns, y = time, color = type)) + 
  geom_point() + geom_line() + 
  xlab("Number of observations") + 
  ylab("Elapsed time")

```
